Row.Text: You're a fool if you really think you can defeat me.
Oh good, you've saved me the trouble of having to attack you.
Don't judge my strength based on your meaningless mortal standards.
Perhaps you may capture my cities. You may come to regret doing so.
I suppose you have to try to stop me, no matter the odds. Not that you will succeed.
I see you're finally starting to go insane. I will put you into even greater misery. There are worse fates than death, you know.
You may have defeated me, but I will rise again, long after you are dead. Pleasant dreams, by the way.
I will always be with you, whether you know it or not. Your holy men will not save you.
Hmm, an indigineous leader. I suppose you can be tolerated, for now.
Your cooperation with me has been noted. There may be a place for you in my new world.
You know, friendly relations between some of my kind and humans is not unheard of. It can have many benefits.
Greetings, I suppose.
You have business here, I presume?
You have presumption, to come speak to me.
Your time is coming, don't worry.
It amuses me, how humans like you always think you can resist.
You will come to regret opposing me. They always do.
Are you really trying to sneak an army up on me? I have senses beyond your comprehension.
Settling near my minions has historically had unpleasant results. I recommend that you desist.
Open passage with my empire has many benefits.
My people wish to spread knowledge of the truth to yours.
This agreement was mutually beneficial, we should continue it.
I would appreciate the continuation of this agreement.
You are no longer providing enough in this deal to make it worthwhile. I recommand you offer more.
This agreement is no longer advantageous to me. Care you negotiate?
Your empire has a good deal of wealth. You are more familiar than I with this human method of exchange.
I have not seen an empire as wealthy as yours since the golden days of Yith.
For a human empire, you have an impressive military capacity.
I am always pleased to have strong allies, provided they stay allies.
Foolish human... If leaders like you would stop squabbling and fighting like infants, your race might get somewhere.
The kind of actions you perform...they show why your species needs my leadership.
If your people work well with me, there may be a place for you in the new world.
Cooperation with me has many advantages.
I, too, have declared friendship with {1_CivName}. You humans are more rational than I expected.
I agree that {1_CivName} is a worthy ally. Your judgment is sound.
I am glad you have seen the benefits of allying with {1_CivName}. It augurs well for you.
Your friendship {1_CivName} is a good decision. Perhaps we can all work together.
I would like to exchange embassies with you.
Diplomatic interchange with me could provide myriad benefits.
My people would like to know the manner of yours.
You should prefer to have me where you can see me. Using the alternate method can end so unpleasantly...
My secrets are not that easily stolen. You don't want to know what happened to your spy, trust me.
The secrets of the Old Ones are not yours to steal, mortal.
Your cooperation with us against {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} is noted.
Our war against {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} may be the start of a new age for Humanity.
Very well.
That makes sense.
That is agreeable.
I appreciate your cooperation.
That is good.
It is agreed.
Hmm, your willingness to aid me is noted.
You are wise, to know the benefits of helping me.
Yes?
What is your business?
Have you anything to offer?
What do you bring for me?
Let us discuss.
That offer will not be sufficient.
I cannot accept that deal.
That offer is both unreasonable and insulting.
Do not insult me, mortal.
This is already an acceptable deal.
I dislike haggling. This is fine already.
Let us exchange objects of value.
Trade with us has many benefits.
Mutual exchange is the only path to...wait, have you discovered Economics yet?
I do not think a trade is possible here.
It is unlikely that any such arrangement is possible.
Thank you for your cooperation.
I appreciate your cooperation.
You know, there might be a place for you in my new world.
Excellent.
This is agreeable.
Some human leaders are not so bad. I have come to adjust my view of your species.
Disappointing.
I do not think that is a wise decision.
Hmm. It is not wise to displease me.
Your return of my minions is greatly appreciated.
I am grateful for your assistance with my missing civilians.
Your cooperation here may return benefits someday.
Thank you for your assistance. Cultivating good relations with me is wise.
So scared already?
I have a planet to conquer. No peace.
I will inform the other leaders of this world of your perfidy.
It should be known to the world how much you have displeased me.
It is time to tell the world of your transgressions.
{1_PlayerName:textkey} needs to be destroyed. Will you aid me?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has insulted me for far too long. Let us destroy them together.
It is time to wipe {1_PlayerName:textkey} off this planet. I can count on your assistance?
I am just checking in on my future minions. Don't mind me.
You humans never cease to amaze me with your pathetic ways.
If you hope to stand a chance against me, you certainly must have a better military than that. I don't want this to be too easy.
You know, there was a race, long ago, which had a military like yours. They were easily crushed.
The culture of your people is pathetic. This is why Humanity needs my leadership.
Come to surrender?
If you capitulate now, I may show some mercy.
It seems I may have to return to slumber soon. Well, I always win in the long-run.
I know when it is time to concede defeat. What will it take to end this war?
You may be victorious for now, human. What will it take to end this war?
You are a fool, as I thought.
It is not wise to insult me. It rarely ends well.
Perhaps I will kill you sooner, rather than later.
When this planet is mine, I know now who to eliminate immediately.
There are worse fates than death, you know.
I doubt I can offer enough to make you agree.
Do not repeat the same offer twice.
You have already offered that. No.
Repeated an offer I already declined does not improve my conception of you.
I may be immortal, but that does not mean I can tolerate monotony.
I understand that you wish to bask in my radiance, but I do not appreciate these repeated visits..
Working together with me on technology is sure to provide many benefits.
I question the value of deals with a promise-breaker such as you.
Your cooperation is noted. What do you wish to discuss?
{1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} continues to be a thorn in my side. What is your business?
{1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} continues to displease me. What do you wish to speak on?
Best of luck with your conflict What do you want to talk about?
If you are doing too well in your war, I may have to intervene. What do you want?
I would greatly appreciate a token of your friendship as tribute.
Do not make me repeat myself. No.
Purchasing tiles near me does not please me.
Any further tile purchases, and I may have to accelerate the timetable on your destruction.
So your promise not to buy land is worth as much as I thought it was. You should remember this, after I destroy you.
Very well.
This agreement is acceptable.
Let us end this tiresome conflict.
It is clear this war is going nowhere. Let use end it, and rebuild our armies.
Constraining the planet's territory with artificial lines is so pointless, wouldn't you agree?
{1_MinorCivName:textkey} serves me, not you. You should remember that.
Let us trade some luxuries. My minions need entertainment.
Sending a spy to my lands was not wise. Your spy would agree, if his mind were still intact.
I am not pleased by your conquest {@1_MinorCivName}. My promises of protection must, ultimately, be backed by force.
It is embarrassing to concede needing human technology. But, my spy is dead. Let us leave it at that.
Human self-rule brings only misery. Your empire is an example of this.
There may be only one of me, but that does not mean your people should try to emulate my example.
I would like the conquest of this planet to be mildly challenging. I recommend you establish more settlements.
Your people have bowed to my superior culture, as is proper.
My minions are following your foolish cultural traditions. Working with humans is so tiresome.
Your cooperation with my proposal is appreciated.
It is, of course, natural that I be host of your World Congress, and I am glad you recognize that.
I appreciate your cooperation.
Do not blame me when this redounds poorly on you.
The artifacts within my land belong to me. Not to you.
Very well, if you feel so protective of your trinkets.
Clearly you think these artifacts are valuable. Therefore, I cannot agree to stop taking them.
I am the only true god. Convincing my people otherwise is offensive.
Very well.
We will see whether you come to regret this.
Unlike your faith, my people worship a true god. The conversions will continue.
Very well, if you insist.
It is not wise to displease me.
Thanks for overlooking this embarrassment.
Your actions against our proposal at the {1_LeagueName} are noted. I hope your decision turns out to be worth it.
I am glad you understand the proper place of things.
Your cooperation is noted.
You may come to regret this decision.
It is not wise to displease me.
Do not displease me, human.
By declaring friendship {1_CivName}, you have declared friendship with one of my enemies. Not a wise decision.
Your denouncement of {1_CivName} is accurate. I will tell the world so.
{1_CivName} is a useful ally to me. Your denouncement is noted as evidence of resistance.
Your {1_CivName}, following me, is the correct action.
I will provide aid, as is only proper for a superior being.
It is not surprising that you needed my help.
No. You are foolish to think me weak. Do not use your petty human judgment to judge me.
Such a demand is an insult, and will be remembered.
Your demands are too frequent. They grow tiresome.
I will not give you so much assistance.
You ask too much. I will not build your empire for you.
So you continue to insult me. You are only shortening your lifespan.
Such foolishness, to think you could demand something like that.
It is strange, how humans can hold such delusions of grandeur.
Very good. I am glad you see the folly of your previous actions.
Then the fate of your spies can only lie on your conscience.
I have demanded gold from one your protected city-states. We both know your promise of protection is a farce anyway.
You are being reasonable for once.
I am not surprised.
It is natural that I must destroy your protected city-state.
You're as weak as I thought.
You persist in your foolish resistance.
If you surrender, I may spare you my more...insidious tortures.
You taunt me with your presence. You are only assuring your own doom.
Your presence here is not desired. But then I suppose I have you marked for destruction anyway.
With an army like that, it will be easy to make short work of you.
With only a few settlements, it is amusing that you style yourself a great leader.
Your aggressive tile purchasing has attracted my attention. You do not want my attention.
Build cities so aggressively only invites me to take them.
It is time for my plans to proceed.
It is time to conquer another piece of this world.
Your people will make a fine addition to my minions.
It is inevitable that I rule this world. You are in the way.
It is time I continued my conquest of this world.
Deceiving you was necessary for my plans, because of your power. It is time to destroy you.
This must be done. I am surprised to feel regret at this.
To rule this world, I must conquer you. I am surprised to feel regret at this.
Your weakness is my chance to destroy you.
All humans eventually leave a weakness open to exploit. It is time for me to conquer you.
Your land will be a fine addition to my empire.
My territory must expand to cover this world.
It is time to expand my dominion of this world.
You are too powerful, and I must destroy you.
I cannot tolerate a powerful empire like yours to exist. I will destroy it.
Deceiving you was necessary for my plans. It is time to destroy you.
I suppose, but I may someday have to expand by other means.
It is empty land, and it is presumptious of you to try to claim it.
So you are useless as an ally. I should not be surprised.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
We must discuss an important matter. {1_CivName} has become a threat to my plans, and must be destroyed. Let us work together to do so. (WILL DECLARE WAR IMMEDIATELY)
I have an important request to make of you. {1_CivName} has clearly shown their perfidy, and as my ally, you should join me in denouncing them.
I will remember this.
You have this, and I want it. Hand it over.
Your seizure of my land will not go unpunished.
I understand. We will help you.
Very well, but I need to prepare. Give me 10 turns, and I will come to you when ready.
Sorry, but this does not suit my plans.
I suppose you're here about the spy.
Do not think I will ignore your demands from {@1_MinorCivName}. My promise of protection may someday be backed by force.
You think you can attack me because you think me weak? How very amusing.
I shall look forward to crushing you easily.
I admit I am surprised by this attack. Your species diminishes in my estimation.
I admit I am surprised by this attack. I had misjudged your wisdom.
Do not think I will ignore you attacking {@1_MinorCivName}. I require you to stop.
So your promises are worthless. I have learned something about your today.
I thought you might attack. It is time you learned how foolish you are
I admit I am surprised by this attack. I may not trust your kind in the future.
I admit I am surprised by this attack. But I will not be fulled twice.
Well...we'll see about that.
This is hardly surprising.
Your military seems to be gathering near my borders. I hope you are smarter than to attack me.
We may have delcarde friendship, but your actions prove your lack of worth. I will denounce you.
A powerful empire like yours should have little to fear from one such as me.
It is time for war, as you promised.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
Your aggressive expansion has not gone unnoticed. What is your business here?
Do not think I don't see your army at my borders. What is your business here?
Your aggressive plot-buying has not gone unnoticed.
This war is pointless. Is it not time we ended it?
You denounce me, then come to speak to me? How very inconsistent.
You want to talk to me even after I denounced you? How very...submissive.
I am glad we agree about the perfidy of {1_PlayerName}.
{1_PlayerName} is a loyal ally, despite your accusations.
{1_PlayerName} has insulted me on many an occasion. It is not wise to be friends with them.
It is good to speak to another friend of {1_PlayerName}.
Well, I'm not surprised.
I suppose we'll see.
You denounced {1_CivName}, so they will make good allies. It is good how predictable you are.
Being friends with {1_CivName} is unwise. I am just warning you.
Well, you may come to regret this someday.
I suppose you are at least willing to pretend to listen.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is marching an army to sneak attack {2_CityName}. I hope this will be useful information.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is sending an army to attack you. I hope this will be useful information.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is sending ships to sneak attack {2_CityName}. I hope this will be useful information.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is sending ships to attack you. I hope this will be useful information.
You cannot make such demands of me. No.
I suppose. It is not very cooperative of you.
Someone has been stealing technology from my cities. Can you assure me that it was not you?
I am sorry, but I do not know enough about you. Perhaps later.
I am glad you're willing to show your cooperation.
I appreciate your willingness to assist.
If you get too powerful, I may have to destroy you. Just a warning.
Well, I guess I'll just attack you instead, useless ally that you are.
We have accidentally attacked your protected city-state. I apologize, but we are allies, yes?
Hmm, I suppose.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Hmm, I suppose.
Thank you for your cooperation.
We accidentally demanded gold from your protected city-state. I apologize, but we are allies, yes?
Such a World Congress Proposal is an attack on me. I will not let this go unanswered.
IYour World Congress proposal is pleasing to me. Well done.
I am glad you also understood the need to denounce {1_PlayerName}.
{1_PlayerName} is a loyal ally, and I find it strange for you to denounce them.
So be it.
To rule a nation, it is a necessary to wield a strong hand. Join me in adopting autocracy.
Minions perform better when they think they have freedom. Join me in adopting Freedom.
Your minions clamor for a new, more efficient social order. Join me in adopting Order.
Your influence have convinced my minions of the merits of Autocracy. Humans are so foolish sometimes.
All your talk about freedom and liberty has corrupted my minions. Humans are so foolish sometimes.
My workers keep going on strike, because of your pernicious influence. Humans are so foolish sometimes.
I'm glad we both understand the importance of having a strong leader. Autocracy is the only proper system of government.
I'm glad to see you also adopted Freedom. Minions perform better when they think they have freedom.
I'm glad to see you importance of a clear, collective social order. Perhaps we may work on our 5-Year Plans together.
I appreciate your warning. I may return the favor someday.
